name: Click The Button (anotherBoredDev)
description:
Hit download and enjoy a short but fun experience based on clicker games by playing through 5 different levels with each having various obstacles making it harder but not imposible to beat

Modifying assets:

The way the game is built allows you to modify the button assets to whatever you want, so if you're looking for a custom experience just create a new button and replace the default one!

Credits:

  • All assets and scripts made by anotherBoredDev
  • Game developed using raylib and C
